name: おてんきパラダイス スノーブラザーズ2
summary: A sequel was released in 1994 titled Snow Bros. 2: With New Elves, known in Japan as Otenki Paradise: Snow Bros. 2. It was Toaplan's final arcade game, as the company filed for bankruptcy during the game's release.
info:
• 中文名: 雪人兄弟2
  • 开发: TOAPLAN
  • 别名: Snow Bros. 2 With New Elves
  • 别名: スノーブラザーズ2
  • 别名: Otenki Paradise: Snow Bros. 2
  • 平台: ARC
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1994年4月
